  • Constructor Details

    • BotPlayer

      public BotPlayer​(java.lang.String id, Level level, Game game)

  • Method Details

    • place

      public boolean place()
      This method randomly places all this bot's ships. Exceptions of type CommandExecuteException are caught but ignored, so the bot's can keep trying to place their ships if the position they've chosen is not valid.
      Overrides:
      place in class Player
      Returns:
      true to indicate that the ships have been placed.

    • botAttack1

      private void botAttack1()
      This method performs the strategy for the EASY level bots. It shoots randomly.

    • botAttack2

      private void botAttack2()
      This method performs the strategy for the HARD level bots. It shoots at all positions from left to right and from top to bottom.

    • botAttack3

      private void botAttack3()
      This method performs the strategy for the INSANE level bots. It shoots at random but when a ship is hit its adjacent positions are saved into a queue so the chances of sinking the ship are greater.

    • addAdjacent

      private void addAdjacent​(int x, int y)
      This method adds to possibleShots the adjacent positions to the position (x, y).
      Parameters:
      x - an int representing the x coordinate of the position.
      y - an int representing the y coordinate of the position.

    • shot

      private boolean shot​(int player, Position pos)
      This method is a combination of Game.checkPosition(Position) and Game.botAttack(int, Position). It is used by botAttack3().
      Parameters:
      player - the Player that will be checked.
      pos - the Position that will be checked.
      Returns:
      true if attacking was possible, false otherwise.

    • attack

      public boolean attack()
      This method chooses the correct strategy for a BotPlayer depending on the Level difficulty.
      Overrides:
      attack in class Player
      Returns:
      true to indicate that the attack has been performed correctly.
